changeSet.author: pavbatol
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO regions (country_id, name) SELECT c.country_id, COALESCE(NULLIF(t.addr_region, ''), '-') FROM countries c JOIN temp_cities t ON UPPER(c.code) = 'RU' ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

changeSet.author: pavbatol
changeSet.sql: MERGE INTO regions AS target USING ( SELECT DISTINCT c.country_id AS country_id, COALESCE(NULLIF(t.addr_region, ''), '-') AS addr_region FROM countries c JOIN temp_cities t ON UPPER(c.code) = 'RU' ) AS source ON target.country_id = source.country_id AND target.name = source.addr_region WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (country_id, name) VALUES (source.country_id, source.addr_region)

changeSet.author: pavbatol
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO districts (region_id, name) SELECT r.region_id AS region_id, COALESCE(NULLIF(t.addr_district, ''), '-') AS addr_district FROM regions r JOIN temp_cities t ON r.name = COALESCE(NULLIF(t.addr_region, ''), '-') GROUP BY r.region_id, t.addr_district HAVING NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM districts d WHERE d.region_id = r.region_id AND d.name = COALESCE(NULLIF(t.addr_district, ''), '-') )

changeSet.author: pavbatol
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO cities (district_id, name) SELECT DISTINCT d.district_id, t.name_ru FROM districts d JOIN regions r on d.region_id = r.region_id JOIN temp_cities t ON d.name = COALESCE(NULLIF(t.addr_district, ''), '-') WHERE NULLIF(t.name_ru, '') IS NOT NULL AND r.name = COALESCE(NULLIF(t.addr_region , ''), '-') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM cities c WHERE c.district_id = d.district_id AND c.name = NULLIF(t.name_ru, '') )
